channel.title: automation on Some Title
channel.description: Recent content in automation on Some Title

item.title: [Automation] Read mail (msg file) with Python
item.description: In a previous article, I showed you how to load folder and email information from Outlook. Read Outlook emails with Python https://qiita.com/konitech913/items/8a285522b0c118d5f905 Even without doing so, I think there are cases where you want to read individual mail data (msg file) and read the information in the mail. For example, you may want to save an “inquiry email” as a msg file in a folder on your PC and extract the information from that file and copy it to Excel.

item.title: Fast automated test creation using pyATS|Genie's hidden move Blitz
item.description: This article was posted as the 11th day of Cisco Systems Japan Advent Calendar 2019 by volunteers from Cisco. 2017 version: https://qiita.com/advent-calendar/2017/cisco 2018 version: https://qiita.com/advent-calendar/2018/cisco 2019 version: https://qiita.com/advent-calendar/2019/cisco #Introduction Hello. pyATS|GenieI'm@tahigash3fromthedevelopmentteam.Inthisarticle,I’llshowyouaneasywaytocreateanetworktestusingpyATS|Genie. Please refer to the previous article for a brief introduction and installation of pyATS|Genie. Easily check multi-vendor networks with pyATS/Genie and Robot Framework Worries about network automation I have enumerated the worries of those who have not done network automation yet.
